Strange... line 60 is not executable code - it's a close brace. In any event we should not allow detail formatters to be created for Array types.
The New/Edit detail formatter actions in the variables view should be disabled for array types.

Strange!  

I got it again with a new workspace running this version of Eclispe:

Version: 3.3.0
Build id: I20061212-0010

The exception resulted from trying to create a new detail formatting by selecting the args[] from the main method.

args[] = String[0].

For me the NPE was at line 34:

The variables view was not the selection provider at the time the action was invoked... this caused the structured selection to be null as it was still a text selection from the editor.

The fix to the NPE is to ensure the tree has focus when the variables view is opened. By default it gave focus to the source viewer on creation.

Fixed in VariablesView.
